[[module css]]
.galerie {
    --transition: 200ms ease-in;
    --transition-delay: 100ms;
}

/* Placement */
.galerie {
    text-align: center;
}
.galerie .cw {
    display: grid;
    place-items: center;
    place-content: center;
    grid-template: "container";
    width: fit-content;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: 1.5rem;
}
.galerie .cw > * {
    grid-area: container;
}

/* Ã‰tiquette */
.galerie .cw a {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    text-align: center;

    border-radius: 7px;
    background-color: #202020;
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px rgb(0 0 0 / 55%), -2px -2px 5px rgb(0 0 0 / 55%), -2px 2px 5px rgb(0 0 0 / 55%), 2px -2px 5px rgb(0 0 0 / 55%);

    font-size: 2rem;
    color: white;

    transition: var(--transition);
    transition-delay: var(--transition-delay);
}

/* Floutage */
.galerie .cw img {
    transition: var(--transition);
    -webkit-filter: blur(12px);
    filter: blur(12px);
}

/* Suppression au survol */
.galerie .cw:hover a,
.galerie .cw:target a {
    opacity: 0;
}
.galerie .cw img:hover,
.galerie .cw:target img {
    -webkit-filter: blur(0.001px);
    filter: blur(0.001px);
    transition: var(--transition);
    transition-delay: var(--transition-delay);
}

/* Panel des CW */
.galerie .cw .gore {
    background-color: #d90000;
    color: white;
}
.galerie .cw .sexe {
    background-color: #80ACFE;
    color: black;
}
.galerie .cw .creepy {
    background-color: #E1009D;
    color: white;
}
[[/module]]
